body.name: Chain Mail
body.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows.

off_hand.name: Shield
off_hand.description: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand.
